pradhana dumriya margaye bujjomuwa dumriya sthanaya sanwardhanaya kirima itha ikmanin aarambha kirima gana pradeshawasihu rajayatath dumriya departhamenthuwatath siya prasadaya pala karathi.me dumriya sthanayata magi palamak awashya bawath wedikawa adi dekak esawiya yuthu bawath illimak labune itha mathakadiya.eeta prathichara dakwu dumriya samanyadhikari bi. ee. pi. aariyarathna mahatha athulu ehi niladharin saha dambaadeniya shrilanipa pradhana sanwidhayaka kurunagala disthrik parlimenthu manthri shantha bandara mahatha athulu deshapalana adhikariyath rupiyal laksha 90kata aasanna mudalak nirdesha kara wada aarambha karana ladi.bujjomuwa, siyambaalapitiya, morugama, galwarama, miriheliya, kandahena yana gamwala janathawata meyin imahath sethak salasi thibe..
